title: POCOâ€™s latest budget phone packs MediaTek Dimensity 700, a 50MP camera and a 5,000mAh battery
content:
Hot on the heels of the POCO F4 GT announcement, POCO is back again with a new smartphone launch. The company has just unveiled the POCO M4 5G in India. The latest offering is aimed at budget-conscious buyers and offers a solid hardware package at an affordable price. POCO M4 5G: Specifications Specification POCO M4

The post POCO’s latest budget phone packs MediaTek Dimensity 700, a 50MP camera and a 5,000mAh battery appeared first on XDA.
description: The POCO M4 5G is a rebranded version of the Redmi 10 5G. It packs a 6.58-inch display, Dimensity 700 SoC, a 5,000mAh battery and more.
